snippet: A video produced by a safety agency warned of the dangers of a chemistry experiment that went awry at a Manhattan school this week.
abstract: United States Chemical Safety Board, a federal safety agency, issued video warning of dangers of a particular chemistry experiment just weeks before same experiment went awry in a classroom at Manhattan's Beacon High School, critically burning student Alonzo Yanes; experiment, known as the Rainbow, has caused at least seven similar accidents across the country and is focus of agency's ongoing investigation.
lead_paragraph: A video produced by a safety agency warned of the dangers of a chemistry experiment that went awry at a Manhattan school this week.

headline.main: School Experiment That Burned Boy Was Focus of Federal Warning
headline.print_headline: School Experiment That Critically Burned Boy Was Focus of Federal Warning
